name: COBBLE
description:
Don't you wish that you could live in an age without cellphones, but instead had rad inventions powered by gears and STEAM???

Well, now you can!

Play as clocksmith Cornelius O. Cobble as he makes his way up a puzzle-ridden, steampunk styled tower to do his gosh darn job. Easy, right? All he has to do is navigate a network of pipes and levers to activate a variety of gear-powered contraptions to repair a clock twenty times his size. Like I said, easy peasy~.

Made during a 48 hour Game Jam, Download now for free!  Or Donate and be one of the cool kids! Either way, Enjoy!

How to play: A and D to move left and right respectively, Spacebar to jump, E to interact with gears and more machines, and T to restart the level if ya get stuck!

Meet the Cornorbolus team!

Lead Designer - Judah

Lead Programmer - Rhys

Junior Programmer - Khalil

Prop and Character Artist - Michael

Environmental Artist - Morgan

Character Animator - Lexi

Sound Designer and Composer - Jeremiah

and Executive Producer - Kendrick East
